title: Romance: Classically Exposed (Exhibitionist Voyeurism Contemporary Romance)
description: Catherine, a confident paralegal, has grown tired of the girl-meets-boy storyline that fairytales taught her to want. Now she’s discovered a new appetite in exhibitionism. After cruising forums and blogs dedicated to the fetish, she plans her first foray as an exhibitionist. When she exposes herself to her first lover, the sensual adrenaline rush is unlike anything she’s ever experienced. It shows her everything her sexual life has been missing, and after that she’s able to take control in the bedroom and use her body for her own pleasure, not just that of her lovers.Since then she’s been on the hunt for the ultimate exhibitionist experience. When she’s given tickets to the orchestra and finds herself in need of appropriate evening wear, her inspiration comes from the least likely of sources: the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue. Hidden in plain sight, she navigates the crowded concert hall. She attracts the attention of an unhappy husband and a mystery man in the balcony above. With their help, she just might enjoy the show of a lifetime.
author: Lexi Lauderdale
